game.name: Twin Stick Heroes 2
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fight, deceive, and blow up your friends in weird and perilous battlefields. Its like if Towerfall and Enter the Gungeon were mixed together, with a large dose of silliness inspired by Duck Game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fight, deceive, and blow up your friends in weird and perilous battlefields. Its like if Towerfall and Enter the Gungeon were mixed together, with a large dose of silliness inspired by Duck Game.
